scripts.build-production: JEKYLL_ENV=production webpack && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build  --config _config.yml,_config_production.yml
scripts.build-staging: JEKYLL_ENV=staging webpack && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config_staging.yml
scripts.build-development: JEKYLL_ENV=development webpack --mode=development && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml
scripts.debug: JEKYLL_ENV=development webpack && bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml
scripts.debug-webpackdev: JEKYLL_ENV=development webpack --mode=development && bundle exec jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config_development.yml
